casebody.data:
SETLIFF
v.
SUBWAY REAL ESTATE. No. 413PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 9, 2007. Norman Sloan, Clemmons, for Subway Real Estate.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of April 2007 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Don Setliff and Associates) shall have up to and including the 9th day of May 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By *79order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of April 2007."
